titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: Whole upper area of card is very difficult to read <*> = year is hard to read, looks like "1911" but that does not make sense <*> Madame Sabin = final name crossed out, hard to read <*> Garnes = "Seb"? <*> Le Tremblay = "Dumpreire"? <*> Magic Mountain = "Brissili"? <*> Oct 29 = "Come"? s2: <*> Aug 20 = "Vinfimain"?

body.ab:
